20101225083543.000|20101225083547.000|CC1|INDEPENDENTIES THE INTERPLAY OF 
20101225083547.000|20101225083548.000|CC1|GRACE AND FREEDOM OR THE        
20101225083548.000|20101225083553.000|CC1|INTERPLAY OF CALL AND RESPONSE. 
20101225083553.000|20101225083602.000|CC1|THE TWO ARE INACCEPTERABLY WOVEN
20101225083602.000|20101225083602.000|CC1|TOGETHER.                       
20101225083602.000|20101225083604.000|CC1|THIS PART OF THE ANGEL'S MESSAGE
20101225083604.000|20101225083607.000|CC1|IS BOTH PROMISE AND CALL AT THE 
20101225083607.000|20101225083608.000|CC1|SAME TIME.                      
20101225083608.000|20101225083610.000|CC1|GOD HAS ANTICIPATED US WITH THE 
20101225083610.000|20101225083614.000|CC1|GIFT OF HIS SON.

20101225083618.000|20101225083620.000|CC1|HE DOES NOT CEASE TO SEARCH FOR 
20101225083620.000|20101225083621.000|CC1|US, TO RAISE US UP AS OFTEN AS  
20101225083621.000|20101225083624.000|CC1|WE MIGHT NEED.                  
20101225083624.000|20101225083626.000|CC1|HE DOES NOT ABANDON LOST SHEEP

20101225083630.000|20101225083630.000|CC1|HAD STRAYED.                    
20101225083630.000|20101225083634.000|CC1|GOD DOES NOT ALLOW HIMSELF TO BE
20101225083634.000|20101225083639.000|CC1|CONFOUNDED BY OUR SIN.

20101225084039.000|20101225084040.000|CC1|BEFORE MASS HAS HELPED TO CREATE
